ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in http://example.org/fhir/CodeSystem/gridhamd-answer-options-cs
CodeDisplay
Q12-1Absent and Absent or clinically insignificant
Q12-2Mild (Some loss of appetite but eating without encouragement; less interest or pleasure in eating) and Absent or clinically insignificant
Q12-3Mild (Some loss of appetite but eating without encouragement; less interest or pleasure in eating) and Occasional
Q12-4Mild (Some loss of appetite but eating without encouragement; less interest or pleasure in eating) and Much of the time
Q12-5Mild (Some loss of appetite but eating without encouragement; less interest or pleasure in eating)and Almost all the time
Q12-6Marked (Marked loss of appetite, very little interest or pleasure in eating (e.g., forcing self to eat)) and Occasional
Q12-7Marked (Marked loss of appetite, very little interest or pleasure in eating (e.g., forcing self to eat)) and Much of the time
Q12-8Marked (Marked loss of appetite, very little interest or pleasure in eating (e.g., forcing self to eat)) and Almost all the time

description.value: ValueSet including Q12 of the GRID-HAMD Questionnaire answer options.
